home.primary: Front-end developer passionate about web development and creating great user experiences.
home.secondary: Focused and constantly learning from Caracas, Venezuela.

0.title: SmartType
0.description: A powerful browser extension enabling users to create custom commands for automating repetitive typing tasks.

1.title: To Do App
1.description: An interactive task management web application for organizing your daily tasks efficiently.

2.title: Weather App
2.description: A web application that allows users to search for a city and retrieve the current weather conditions and the forecast for the week.

3.title: Simon Says
3.description: A memory game in which the player must repeat a sequence of colors and sounds randomly throughout the game.

about.title: I Bring Your Ideas To Life
about.fst: My focus is on creating web applications that have a positive impact on people's lives.
about.snd: One of my main strengths is to approach challenges creatively and effectively, tailoring unique solutions. In addition, I excel in my ability to listen, give and receive feedback in a constructive and open manner, which is an important part of my approach to teamwork.
about.thd: I consider myself an amateur film critic, so I enjoy watching movies of various genres and eras. I also deeply love animals, 90's music, and playing the guitar.
about.fth: Currently, I am looking for opportunities to continue learning and growing in the web development field.

movies.title: Some movies I have seen recently and recommend ;)

contact.text: I am always open to new opportunities that allow me to grow professionally.
